This Texas mother and vocal gun advocate snapped and took the life of her own two children over a simple family argument after spending years criticizing Democrats for "wanting to take her guns away":  "A family spat started inside the married couple’s Houston-area home and spiraled into gun violence that spilled out onto their street.  “It was a family argument that turned into a shooting,” Fort Bend County Sheriff Troy Nehls told the Houston Chronicle. “But we’re still trying to put the pieces together.”   Read more HERE: @webpagelink  Thanks to Point Counter Point.
